Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.gamepanels

Class MarketDiscardDialog

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.gamepanels.MarketDiscardDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class MarketDiscardDialog
extends javax.swing.JPanel
Panel to be used as dialog to select what resources to discard and what resources to be kept
